name: Fight Bytes (LD48)
description:
A largely unfinished tech demo! A tactics game made in a custom engine.

Directions: Click on the launch pads to select the units you want to use. After selections, press space to start. Click on a unit to select it, click on an adjacent square to move. Use the ‘1’ and ‘2’ buttons to select an attack. Click a square to to attack the other unit. Press space to end your turn and go to AI’s turn.
